title: Barrister Aqeel pays tribute to Capt. Sarwar on 76th death anniversary
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 27 (APP):Advisor to the Prime Minister on Law and Justice, Barrister Aqeel Malik on Saturday paid glowing tributes to the Captain Muhammad Sarwar Shaheed (Nishan-e-Haider) on his 76th death anniversary.
Barrister Aqeel Malik emphasized that the sacrifices of martyrs like Captain Sarwar will never be forgotten. He called them national heroes who gave their lives for the safety, security, and future of Pakistan.
Malik urged the youth to honor these heroes and serve the country with the same dedication and patriotism.
“Martyrs are our national heroes,” Malik stated. He urged the youth to remember those who laid down their lives for the country.
